mapper.select: SELECT study_no, comment_no, study_comment.member_no, study_comment.stat, username, content, study_comment.created_date, parent_comment_no, layer FROM study_comment JOIN member ON study_comment.member_no = member.member_no WHERE study_no = #{studyNo} ORDER BY parent_comment_no ASC, layer ASC, comment_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_comment(member_no, study_no, parent_comment_no, content) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{studyNo}, (SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()+1), #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE study_comment SET content = "삭제되었습니다.", stat = "삭제" WHERE comment_no = #{commentNo}
